mapper.select: SELECT ENO , PWD , EMP_NM , DPRT_CD , DPRT_NM , HDQT_CD , HDQT_NM , 'IT11' as RGHT_CD , PSTN FROM RAA99A WHERE ENO = #{eno}

SELECT ENO , EMP_NM , IFNULL(DPRT_CD, '') AS DPRT_CD , IFNULL(DPRT_NM, '') AS DPRT_NM , IFNULL(HDQT_CD, '') AS HDQT_CD , IFNULL(HDQT_NM, '') AS HDQT_NM FROM RAA99A WHERE 1=1
AND ENO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{eno}, '%')
AND EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empNm}, '%')
AND DPRT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dprtCd}, '%')
AND DPRT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dprtNm}, '%')
